verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> that came to Micah <S%H4318><s%> the Morashtite <S%H4183><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jotham <S%H3147><s%>, Ahaz <S%H271><s%>, and Hezekiah <S%H3169><s%>, kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, which he saw <S%H2372><s%> concerning Samaria <S%H8111><s%> and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%>, ye peoples <S%H5971><s%>, all of you <S%H7181><s%>: hearken, O earth <S%H776><s%>, and all that therein <S%H4393><s%> is <S%H136><s%>: and let the Lord Jehovah <S%H3069><s%> be witness <S%H5707><s%> against you <S%H136><s%>, the Lord from his holy <S%H6944><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%>.

For <S%H3068><s%>, behold, Jehovah cometh forth <S%H3318><s%> out of his place <S%H4725><s%>, and will come down <S%H3381><s%>, and tread <S%H1869><s%> upon the high places <S%H1116><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shall be melted <S%H4549><s%> under him <S%H6010><s%>, and the valleys shall be cleft <S%H1234><s%>, as wax <S%H1749><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%>, as waters <S%H4325><s%> that are poured <S%H5064><s%> down a steep place <S%H4174><s%>.

For the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is all this <S%H2403><s%>, and for the sins of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>. What is the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>? is it not Samaria <S%H8111><s%>? and what are the high places <S%H1116><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>? are they not Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>?

Therefore I will make <S%H7760><s%> Samaria <S%H8111><s%> as a heap <S%H5856><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>, and as places for planting vineyards <S%H3754><s%>; and I will pour down <S%H5064><s%> the stones <S%H68><s%> thereof into the valley <S%H1516><s%>, and I will uncover <S%H1540><s%> the foundations thereof <S%H3247><s%>.

And all her graven images <S%H6456><s%> shall be beaten to pieces <S%H3807><s%>, and all her hires <S%H868><s%> shall be burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, and all her idols <S%H6091><s%> will I lay <S%H7760><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%>; for of the hire <S%H868><s%> of a harlot <S%H2181><s%> hath she gathered <S%H6908><s%> them <S%H868><s%>, and unto the hire of a harlot <S%H2181><s%> shall they return <S%H7725><s%>.

For this will I lament <S%H5594><s%> and wail <S%H5594><s%>; I will go <S%H3212><s%> stripped <S%H7758><s%> and naked <S%H6174><s%>; I will make <S%H6213><s%> a wailing <S%H4553><s%> like the jackals <S%H8577><s%>, and a lamentation <S%H60><s%> like the ostriches <S%H1323><s%>.

For her wounds <S%H4347><s%> are incurable <S%H605><s%>; for it is come <S%H935><s%> even unto Judah <S%H3063><s%>; it reacheth <S%H5060><s%> unto the gate <S%H8179><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, even to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.
Tell <S%H5046><s%> it not in Gath <S%H1661><s%>, weep <S%H1058><s%> not at all <S%H1058><s%>: at Beth-le <S%H1036><s%>-aphrah have I rolled <S%H6428><s%> myself in the dust <S%H6083><s%>.

Pass away <S%H5674><s%>, O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Shaphir <S%H8208><s%>, in nakedness <S%H6181><s%> and shame <S%H1322><s%>: the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Zaanan <S%H6630><s%> is not come forth <S%H3318><s%>; the wailing <S%H4553><s%> of Beth-ezel <S%H1018><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> from you the stay thereof <S%H5979><s%>.

For the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Maroth <S%H4796><s%> waiteth anxiously <S%H2342><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%>, because evil <S%H7451><s%> is come down <S%H3381><s%> from Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> unto the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

Bind <S%H7573><s%> the chariot <S%H4818><s%> to the swift steed <S%H7409><s%>, O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Lachish <S%H3923><s%>: she was the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of sin <S%H2403><s%> to the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>; for the transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were found in thee <S%H4672><s%>.

Therefore shalt thou give <S%H5414><s%> a parting gift <S%H7964><s%> to Moresheth-gath <S%H4182><s%>: the houses <S%H1004><s%> of Achzib <S%H392><s%> shall be a deceitful thing <S%H391><s%> unto the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

I will yet bring <S%H935><s%> unto thee <S%H3427><s%>, O inhabitant of Mareshah <S%H4762><s%>, him <S%H3423><s%> that shall possess thee <S%H3519><s%>: the glory of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> even unto Adullam <S%H5725><s%>.

Make thee bald <S%H7139><s%>, and cut off <S%H1494><s%> thy hair for the children <S%H1121><s%> of thy delight <S%H8588><s%>: enlarge <S%H7337><s%> thy baldness <S%H7144><s%> as the eagle <S%H5404><s%>; for they are gone into captivity from thee <S%H1540><s%>.
